events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund as it does not fit me.
The request has been identified as a refund issue based on the customer's expressed desire to return the product.
Assigning this refund case to the customer service representative specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return the jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please confirm the order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 8745123. The jacket is brand new, unworn, and still with tags attached.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket within 30 days for a full refund. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Great, thank you for your quick response and for sending the return label. I appreciate the smooth process.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, we will process the refund promptly.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send back the jacket and if everything is going smoothly with your refund.
Yes, I shipped it two days ago and received confirmation that you’ve processed my refund. Thanks again!
Glad to hear the refund was processed successfully. We’re closing this case now, and thank you for shopping with us.
